Pre-Game Insights: The Astros will look to extend the series after losing in Game 1.
Hunter Brown is starting for the Astros and Tyler Holton is set to start for the Tigers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitching staff for the Astros has a collective 9.3 K/9, the third-best in the majors.
The Tigers have an 8.4 K/9 this season as a pitching staff, which ranks 21st in the majors.
